title: FTC Green Guides
chunks: The Federal Trade Commission Green Guides help marketers avoid making environmental claims that mislead consumers. Claims must be truthful, not misleading, and substantiated. Vague terms like "eco-friendly" should be avoided unless clearly defined and supported.
original_content: The Federal Trade Commission Green Guides help marketers avoid making environmental claims that mislead consumers. Claims must be truthful, not misleading, and substantiated. Vague terms like "eco-friendly" should be avoided unless clearly defined and supported.

title: EU Taxonomy Regulation
chunks: The EU Taxonomy Regulation establishes a classification system for environmentally sustainable economic activities. Claims about environmental sustainability must align with specific technical screening criteria and avoid misleading consumers about environmental benefits.
original_content: The EU Taxonomy Regulation establishes a classification system for environmentally sustainable economic activities. Claims about environmental sustainability must align with specific technical screening criteria and avoid misleading consumers about environmental benefits.
